name: Bomb
description: Increase the number of deployable bombs.

name: Mine Bomb
description: A bomb that activates when a monster or player steps on it. When deployed, it will fade into the ground. Typically, only the first bomb placed by a player will be a Mine Bomb.

name: Rubber Bomb
description: These bombs have the looks and properties of a rubbery substance and will bounce when kicked or thrown/punched.

name: Ice Bomb
description: A bomb that freezes enemies on explosion.

name: Dangerous Bomb
description: A bomb that explodes in a specific radius.

name: Power Bomb
description: A bomb with an extremely large explosion radius.

name: Pierce Bomb
description: A bomb with a fire explosion that pierces through obstacles.

name: RC Bomb
description: A remote-controlled bomb that can be detonated at will.

name: Fire
description: Makes the explosion travel one step further.

name: Ice Fire
description: A fire explosion that freezes enemies.

name: Bouncing Fire
description: A fireball that bounces off walls.

name: Mega Fire
description: An extremely powerful and destructive fire explosion.

name: Bomb Kick
description: Allows the bomber to kick bombs in a specific direction.

name: Power Glove
description: Enables the bomber to throw bombs at a distance.

name: Punching Glove
description: Allows the bomber to punch bombs away.

name: Bomb Pass
description: Walk through bombs freely.

name: Vest
description: Make the player invincible for a short time.

name: Super Mushroom
description: Makes Mario grow larger in size and gain an extra hit point.

name: 1-Up Mushroom
description: Grants Mario an additional life when collected.

name: Mega Mushroom
description: Temporarily transforms Mario into a giant, allowing him to crush enemies and obstacles.

name: Poison Mushroom
description: Has a detrimental effect on Mario, causing him to shrink or lose a life.

name: Mini Mushroom
description: Shrinks Mario in size, allowing him to access hidden areas and platforms.

name: Propeller Mushroom
description: Gives Mario the ability to perform a high vertical jump and hover in the air.

name: Super Leaf
description: Transforms Mario into Raccoon Mario, granting him the ability to fly and swipe enemies with his tail.

name: Fire Flower
description: Enables Mario to shoot fireballs and defeat enemies from a distance.

name: Ice Flower
description: Allows Mario to throw iceballs that freeze enemies and create platforms.

name: Boomerang Flower
description: Grants Mario the ability to throw boomerangs that can defeat enemies and collect items.

name: Gold Flower
description: Turns Mario into Gold Mario, allowing him to turn blocks and enemies into coins.

name: Cape Feather
description: Transforms Mario into Cape Mario, granting him the ability to fly and perform spin attacks.

name: Star
description: Temporarily makes Mario invincible and increases his running speed.

name: Hammer
description: Allows Mario to break certain blocks and defeat enemies by throwing hammers.

name: P-Wing
description: Grants Mario unlimited flight and invincibility for the duration of a level.

name: Tanuki Suit
description: Transforms Mario into Tanooki Mario, granting him the ability to glide and turn into a statue to avoid enemies.

name: Blue Shell
description: Provides Mario with a protective shell that allows him to slide and defeat enemies.

name: Cannon Box
description: Turns Mario into Cannon Mario, allowing him to shoot cannonballs to reach distant areas.

name: Penguin Suit
description: Transforms Mario into Penguin Mario, giving him the ability to slide on ice and swim more effectively.

name: Propeller Box
description: Gives Mario a propeller on his head, enabling him to perform high jumps and reach higher platforms.

name: Protein
description: Increases the Attack stat of a Pokémon.

name: Calcium
description: Increases the Special Attack stat of a Pokémon.

name: Iron
description: Increases the Defense stat of a Pokémon.

name: Zinc
description: Increases the Special Defense stat of a Pokémon.

name: Carbos
description: Increases the Speed stat of a Pokémon.

name: HP Up
description: Increases the HP stat of a Pokémon.

name: PP Up
description: Increases the PP (Power Points) of a Pokémon's moves.

name: PP Max
description: Increases the maximum PP of any move to 160% of the original PP. Can be used once per move. Raises the Pokémon's Happiness.

name: Pokédex
description: A device that records information about Pokémon.

name: PokéNav
description: A multifunctional device that provides navigation and communication features.

name: VS Seeker
description: A device that allows the player to rematch trainers for additional battles.

name: Radio Card
description: A card that grants access to various radio channels for news and music.

name: Xtransceiver
description: A communication device that enables video calls with other trainers.

name: Battle Recorder
description: A device that records and replays Pokémon battles for analysis.

name: Poké Ball
description: A standard Poké Ball used to capture wild Pokémon.

name: Great Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Ultra Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate than a Great Ball.

name: Master Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a 100% capture rate. It can catch any wild Pokémon.

name: Premier Ball
description: A rare Poké Ball given as a bonus for purchasing multiples of standard Poké Balls.

name: Dusk Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used in dark areas or at night.

name: Quick Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used at the start of a battle.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate when used on a Pokémon that has been previously caught.

name: Nest Ball
description: A Poké Ball with a higher capture rate on Pokémon with lower levels.
